bronze:Branch.NAME: Branch
bronze:Branch.DESCRIPTION: Choose - Deal !D! damage or gain !B! Block.

bronze:DelayedSlice.NAME: Delayed Slice
bronze:DelayedSlice.DESCRIPTION: bronze:Compile - Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

bronze:Iterate.NAME: Iterate
bronze:Iterate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

bronze:Terminator.NAME: Terminator
bronze:Terminator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - If this is the last card in the Sequence, double its damage.

bronze:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
bronze:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Burn into your draw pile.
bronze:Overheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Burn into your discard pile.

bronze:CutThrough.NAME: Cut Through
bronze:CutThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Scry !M!. NL bronze:Compile - Draw 1 card.

bronze:RecursiveStrike.NAME: Recursive Strike
bronze:RecursiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL At the start of your turn, if this is in the Sequence, increase its damage by 1.

bronze:DarkDash.NAME: Dark Dash
bronze:DarkDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Void into your draw pile.
bronze:DarkDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Void into your discard pile.

bronze:OilSpill.NAME: Oil Spill
bronze:OilSpill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Slimed into your draw pile.
bronze:OilSpill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Slimed into your discard pile.

bronze:WildBeam.NAME: Wild Beam
bronze:WildBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Wound into your draw pile.
bronze:WildBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Add 1 *Wound into your discard pile.

bronze:Frontload.NAME: Frontload
bronze:Frontload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Retain.

bronze:DelayedGuard.NAME: Delayed Guard
bronze:DelayedGuard.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !B! Block.

bronze:Shell.NAME: Shell
bronze:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !B! Block.

bronze:BitShift.NAME: Bit Shift
bronze:BitShift.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in the Sequence to return to your hand. NL It costs 1 less this turn. NL Exhaust.
bronze:BitShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in the Sequence to return to your hand. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

bronze:Batch.NAME: Batch
bronze:Batch.DESCRIPTION: Create a Function immediately out of the cards in the Sequence. NL Exhaust.
bronze:Batch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a Function immediately out of the cards in the Sequence.

bronze:Constructor.NAME: Constructor
bronze:Constructor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - If this is the first card in the Sequence, double its Block.

bronze:Separator.NAME: Separator
bronze:Separator.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL bronze:Compile - If this is not the first or last card in the Sequence, gain [E] [E].

bronze:Update.NAME: Update
bronze:Update.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When bronze:Encoded, Upgrade all cards before this in the Sequence.

bronze:Overload.NAME: Overload
bronze:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL bronze:Compile - Function is placed into your discard pile instead of your hand.

bronze:ReverseEngineer.NAME: Reverse Engineer
bronze:ReverseEngineer.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

bronze:GetLatest.NAME: Get Latest
bronze:GetLatest.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card with bronze:Encode to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

bronze:Flail.NAME: Flail
bronze:Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL bronze:Compile - Gain !M! Artifact.

bronze:DigitalCarnage.NAME: Digital Carnage
bronze:DigitalCarnage.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Ethereal.

bronze:NullPointer.NAME: Null Pointer
bronze:NullPointer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Compile - Function is not created.

bronze:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
bronze:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL bronze:Compile - Gain 2 Dexterity.

bronze:BronzeOrb.NAME: Bronze Orb
bronze:BronzeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL bronze:Encode a random card with bronze:Encode in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

bronze:SearingBeam.NAME: Searing Beam
bronze:SearingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

bronze:Backtrace.NAME: Backtrace
bronze:Backtrace.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Function gains Exhaust.

bronze:CloningBeam.NAME: Cloning Beam
bronze:CloningBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you bronze:Encode a card, bronze:Encode a copy of it. NL Exhaust.
bronze:CloningBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time you bronze:Encode a card, bronze:Encode a copy of it.

bronze:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
bronze:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If the last played card was a Function, play this again.

bronze:ChosenStrike.NAME: Chosen Strike
bronze:ChosenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Reduce the Function's cost by 1 and add 2 Dazed to your draw pile.
bronze:ChosenStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL bronze:Compile - Reduce the Function's cost by 1 and add 2 Dazed to your discard pile.

bronze:ClassDefault.NAME: Class Default
bronze:ClassDefault.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the first card in the current Sequence to the next !M! Sequences automatically.

bronze:ItsAFeature.NAME: It's a Feature
bronze:ItsAFeature.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 Temporary Strength and Dexterity.
bronze:ItsAFeature.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain 1 Temporary Strength and Dexterity.

bronze:InfiniteBeams.NAME: Infinite Beams
bronze:InfiniteBeams.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *Minor *Beam to your hand.
bronze:InfiniteBeams.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *Minor *Beam+ to your hand.

bronze:Optimize.NAME: Optimize
bronze:Optimize.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! Functions you bronze:Compile cost 1 less.

bronze:MaxOutput.NAME: Max Output
bronze:MaxOutput.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 additional card and add 1 *Dazed into your draw pile each turn.

bronze:Mutator.NAME: Mutator
bronze:Mutator.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Transform a Status in your hand into a copy of this.
bronze:Mutator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Transform a Status in your hand into a copy of this.
